ChangeList.Description: Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Microsoft.Graph users resource](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/templates/reference/users).
[Microsoft Graph activity logs](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/microsoft-graph-activity-logs-overview) are now available in China operated by 21Vianet.

Authenticating Event Hubs by using shared access signatures (SAS) will be deprecated soon. To subscribe to [Microsoft Graph change notifications via Azure Event Hubs](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/change-notifications-delivery-event-hubs), we recommend using Microsoft Entra ID role-based access control (RBAC) instead. Follow the [guidance to migrate to RBAC](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/change-notifications-delivery-event-hubs#migrate-an-event-hub-authentication-to-microsoft-entra-id-rbac).

Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources](https://aka.ms/graphbicep).

Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [federatedIdentityCredential](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/federatedIdentityCredential?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources](https://aka.ms/graphbicep).

Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [servicePrincipal](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/servicePrincipal?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources](https://aka.ms/graphbicep).

Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [oAuth2PermissionGrant](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/oAuth2PermissionGrant?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources](https://aka.ms/graphbicep).

Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [appRoleAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/appRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources](https://aka.ms/graphbicep).

Added the Microsoft Graph Bicep resource for deploying the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type using Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) scenarios. For more information, see [Bicep templates for Microsoft Graph resources](https://aka.ms/graphbicep).

Introduced the compliance eDiscovery API, including the [ediscoveryCase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/security-ediscoverycase?view=graph-rest-beta), [reviewSet](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/security-ediscoveryreviewset?view=graph-rest-beta), and [reviewSetQuery](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/security-ediscoveryreviewsetquery?view=graph-rest-beta), and operations.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: schema extensions,Microsoft Cloud for US Government
ChangeList.Description: The [schema extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schemaextension) feature is now generally available in [Microsoft Cloud for US Government](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/deployments).
ChangeList.Target: schema extensions,Microsoft Cloud for US Government
